speak;Emma; Carson, we never got the chance to follow up on the incident with Nicole{tgm}...{tgm}{w} How is she doing now?

speak;Carson; She is doing better than she was before{tgm}...{tgm}{w} Nicole told me some details, but it's better to ask her yourself.{w} Family drama, only made worse that we're heading for Rosefall, where her mother is.
speak;Emma; I'll have to ask her later{tgm}...
speak;Emma; If I can get a bit personal, I actually wanted to ask why you're a thief.{w} Nicole describes you as such an honest man, and you sure seem like it, but{tgm}...{tgm}thief.

speak;Carson; Straight to the point, I see.{w} Back during the war, I was a pretty mediocre mercenary.{w} Eventually, my employers didn't see me as worth the gold,{w} and they tried to make me disappear, but{tgm}...{tgm}{w} I killed them before they got their hands on me.
bop_portrait;Emma
speak;Emma; They were going to kill you?!
bop_portrait;Emma
speak;Emma; For what reason?!{w} I can understand not being willing to pay, but{tgm}...{tgm}{w} <bconvo>that</> shouldn't be a reason to kill you!

speak;Carson; I won't like to you, Emma. I made a lot of enemies in that war.{w} So, after I tied up some loose ends of my own,{w} I ran away from the battlefield.{w} I disguised myself as a thief to give the air of a weak sapling,{w} and I'd overpower people by surprise to rob them blind.{w} That is, until I met my wife Nicole.{w} That's when everything changed.
speak;Emma; That answers my question about the shifty thief aesthetic...;;;thought_bubble;no_talk
speak;Emma; So, you said Nicole changed everything.{w} How did you two meet, anyway?

speak;Carson; It's a bit embarrassing to say, but we met by mistake.{w} A robbery gone wrong.{w} I thought the house was empty,{w} but it was only Nicole's mother who was gone.{w} All I wanted was to steal some food.{w} Nicole caught me red-handed, but{tgm}...{tgm}{w} Well, the poor girl was too terrified to stop me.{w} When I made my escape, though, she gave chase and cornered me.{w} You know what she did, though?{w} She split a couple pieces of bread between the two of us,{w} and we shared it in a dark alley.{w} Nicole said all she wanted to do was help me{tgm}...{tgm}{w} I still have no idea why she decided to pursue a thief like that.
expression;Emma;Smile
speak;Emma; So that's how you guys fell in love! It's such a cute story!
expression;Emma;NoSmile
speak;Emma; Well, minus the home invasion part.
speak;Carson; She changed my life for the better.{w} Thanks for listening to a young man's love story,{w} but you'd better get ready for lookout duty.{w} Your mother will be livid if you miss it.
speak;Emma; Oh, I know all too well{tgm}...{tgm}{w} I'll talk to you later!
